## Raster graphics
```{r}
#install.packages("png")
library("png")
ball <- readPNG("images/squirrel.png", native = TRUE)
plot(0:1, 0:1, type = "n", ann = FALSE, axes = FALSE)
rasterImage(ball, 0, 0, 1, 1)
```
